Subject: Uninstall of password protected Client over CLI
Description:
Hello,
we deploy the client with our software deployment system. It uses MsiExec Commands and works fine for silent installation. We use this command:
MsiExec /I "%SRC%EPPClientSetup.6.2.3.1010_x86_64_[a=172.20.1.37,n=0].msi"

However it seems not possible uninstalling the Client with MSIExec. When starting command MsiExec /X {ID of EP} we get message: "The setup must update files or services that cannot be updated while the system is running. If oyu choose to continue, a reboot will be required to complete the setup"  The uninstall should be password protected by the server. 
How can we uninstall the client over Command LIne / MsiExec Command -including the password if needed?
Best regards
